sentences.en: " Very good, " returned Hurstwood, " only it's the same old thing ,'Rip Van Winkle.'
sentences.cn: “ 很好, " 赫斯渥说, " 还是一出老戏《瑞普凡-温克尔》. ”

sentences.en: A thrill passed over Mr. Winkle's frame.
sentences.cn: 一阵颤栗掠过文克尔先生的身体.

sentences.en: He somehow managed to winkle Picard out of his room.
sentences.cn: 他不知用的什么法子将皮卡德逼出了房间。

sentences.en: I managed to winkle the news out of him.
sentences.cn: 我设法从他那里探到那消息.

sentences.en: I managed to winkle the news out.
sentences.cn: 我好不容易才探听到那消息.

sentences.en: It will not be easy to winkle out the old guard and train younger replacements.
sentences.cn: 解雇老警卫、再训练年轻警卫取而代之并不是件容易的事。

sentences.en: It's too difficult to winkle the truth out of him.
sentences.cn: 从他那儿挖出事实真相真是太难了。

sentences.en: Mr. Winkle looked up at the declining orb.
sentences.cn: 文克尔先生抬头看看落日.

sentences.en: Mr. Winkle was always remarkable for extreme humanity.
sentences.cn: 文克尔先生向来以大慈大悲出名.

sentences.en: The detective was trying to winkle information out of her.
sentences.cn: 侦探试图从她那儿套取信息。

sentences.en: The sadness of the scene imparted a sombre tinge to the feelings of Mr. Winkle.
sentences.cn: 景象的凄凉,使文克尔先生的心情带上了阴暗的色调.

sentences.en: The security services will pretty well go to any lengths to winkle out information.
sentences.cn: 安全部门会不遗余力地套取情报。

sentences.en: The stranger took Mr. Winkle's measure with his eye.
sentences.cn: 陌生人用他的眼睛打量一下文克先生的身材.

sentences.en: They managed to winkle out the spy.
sentences.cn: 他们设法找出了这个间谍.

sentences.en: Winkle shells are abundant on this beach.
sentences.cn: 这个海滩上有大量的峨螺壳.

trans.tran_cn: 挑出， 剔出， 取出
